mapper.insert: insert into device_output (ID, DEVICE_NUM, META_NUM, CODE, VALUE, IS_DEL, OP_FLAG, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{metaNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{opFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update device_output set DEVICE_NUM = #{deviceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, META_NUM = #{metaNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALUE = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=CHAR}, OP_FLAG = #{opFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
